definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Amount of day precipitations in in, cm or mm.
sentences.chinese: 每天以英寸，釐米，毫米的降雨量。

sentences.english: The rainfall in this area averages 800mm a year.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區降雨量年均800毫米。

sentences.english: The whole of the area has less than 250mm rainfall a year.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區一年降雨量少於250毫米。
這裏的年降雨量平均爲700毫米。

sentences.english: The heaviest rainfall amounts occur west-southwest of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 降雨量最大的地區位於上海的西部及西南部。

sentences.english: Rainfall, by contrast, seemed to contribute little to agricultural production trends.
sentences.chinese: 與之相比，降雨量反而顯得對農業生產影響很小。

sentences.english: The rainfall is governed by weather patterns that move in annual cycles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨量受氣候模式控制，一年一次循環往復。

sentences.english: This brings dry air over the African continent, reducing rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 這爲非洲大陸帶來了更多幹燥的空氣，減少了降雨量。

sentences.english: Cuba could get torrential rainfalls of up to 30 inches.
sentences.chinese: 古巴的驟雨降雨量達到了30英寸。

sentences.english: The process of rainfall was recorded by siphon recording rain gauge.
sentences.chinese: 同時由虹吸式自記雨量計記錄降雨量。

sentences.english: It has a steady reliable rainfall throughout the whole year. The temperature varie s within a small range.
sentences.chinese: 全年有穩定可靠的降雨量，氣溫變化幅度小。

sentences.english: The heaviest rainfall occurs southwest of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海西南部將有最高的降雨量。

sentences.english: The rainfall here averages 800mm a year.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的降雨量每年平均爲800毫米。

sentences.english: About 70% of the North and South Courses turf area return rainfall to the reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 北場和南場大概收集70%降雨量儲回於水塘。

sentences.english: There is lots of rain and soil erosion in hills of South China.
sentences.chinese: 我國南方低丘山區降雨量大，水土流失也很嚴重。

sentences.english: For Dok Kham Tai at the Rai overseas airport also. no actual precipitation for the month of May.
sentences.chinese: 牘康巴萊機場也是一樣，五月份沒有確實的降雨量。

definition: the state of moisture in the soil (and whether it can support a crop)
